root.name: Chicken Invaders
root.description: Chicken Invaders is a free for download game that at its core is a mod of space invaders, and features very few differences between Space Invaders. The game has had much successes, and the developers decided to have a sequel, which most say was a letdown because it was a "pay for play" game. One of the game's most viewed aspects was its opening to mods, and having a large community based, which allowed the game to live on way after the original. Some even claim a multiplayer mod was in development, but never saw the light of day because the game wasn't "designed" for multiplayer.
